Package controller

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
controller.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Observable
The Controller class manages the game logic for a Blackjack game, coordinating interactions between the players (human and bots), the deck of cards, and the game view.

    Represents data associated with a playing card image.

    • getInstance

      public static GameLogic getInstance()

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Initializes the game by creating a new deck, dealing cards to the dealer and players, and notifying observers (the game view) of the initial game state.

    • playerHit

      public void playerHit()
      Handles the player's hit action by drawing a card and updating the game state.

    • dealerTurn

      public void dealerTurn()
      Simulates the dealer's turn by drawing cards until the sum is 17 or higher.

    • bot1Turn

      public void bot1Turn()
      Simulates bot player 1's turn by drawing cards until the sum is 17 or higher.

    • bot2Turn

      public void bot2Turn()
      Simulates bot player 2's turn by drawing cards until the sum is 17 or higher.

    • determineWinner

      public String determineWinner()
      Determines the winner of the game based on the current sums of all players and the dealer.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the result of the game.

      public Card getHiddenCard()
      Retrieves the hidden card of the dealer.
      Returns:
      The hidden card of the dealer.

    • getHiddenCardImage

      public Image getHiddenCardImage(boolean stayButtonEnabled)
      Retrieves the image of the hidden card of the dealer based on whether the "stay" button is enabled.
      Parameters:
      stayButtonEnabled - Indicates if the "stay" button is enabled.
      Returns:
      The image of the hidden card if the "stay" button is enabled; otherwise, the image path of the hidden card.

    • getDealerInitialValue

      public String getDealerInitialValue(boolean stayButtonEnabled)
      Returns the initial value of the dealer's hand. If stay button is enabled, returns the value of the second card; otherwise, returns the total sum of the dealer's hand.
      Parameters:
      stayButtonEnabled - Indicates if the stay button is enabled.
      Returns:
      Initial value of the dealer's hand as a formatted string.

    • getPlayerSums

      public List<String> getPlayerSums()
      Returns a list of strings representing the sums of players and the dealer.
      Returns:
      List of player and dealer sums.

    • getWinnerMessage

      public String getWinnerMessage()
      Returns the message announcing the winner.
      Returns:
      Winner message.

    • getDealerCardsData

      public List<GameLogic.CardImageData> getDealerCardsData(boolean stayButtonEnabled, int startX, int startY)
      Returns a list of CardImageData representing the dealer's cards.
      Parameters:
      stayButtonEnabled - Indicates if the stay button is enabled.
      startX - Starting x-coordinate for card images.
      startY - Starting y-coordinate for card images.
      Returns:
      List of CardImageData for dealer's cards.

    • getPlayerCardsData

      public List<GameLogic.CardImageData> getPlayerCardsData(Player player, int startX, int startY, boolean hideFirst)
      Returns a list of CardImageData representing a player's cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose cards are being retrieved.
      startX - Starting x-coordinate for card images.
      startY - Starting y-coordinate for card images.
      hideFirst - If true, hides the first card image.
      Returns:
      List of CardImageData for player's cards.

    • hitAction

      public void hitAction()
      Performs the hit action for the player and triggers game logic if player's sum exceeds 21.

    • stayAction

      public void stayAction()
      Performs the stay action for all bots and triggers game logic.

    • retryAction

      public void retryAction()
      Resets the game and starts a new round.
